[She]76-mrs. fisher was aware that knives in this connection were improper , but [one]229-one did finally lose patience . [Maccaroni]115-maccaroni was never allowed to appear on [her]76-mrs. fisher table in [London]3-london . Apart from its tiresomeness [she]76-mrs. fisher did not even like it , and [she]76-mrs. fisher would tell [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline not to order it again . Years of practice , reflected [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , chopping it up , years of actual living in [Italy]13-italy , would be necessary to learn the exact trick . [Browning]102-browning managed maccaroni wonderfully . [She]76-mrs. fisher remembered watching [him]102-browning one day when [he]102-browning came to lunch with [[her]76-mrs. fisher father]199-her father , and a dish of it had been ordered as a compliment to [his]102-browning connection with [Italy]13-italy . Fascinating , the way it went in . No chasing round the plate , no slidings off the fork , no subsequent protrusions of loose ends — just one dig , one whisk , one thrust , one gulp , and lo , yet [another poet]1194-another poet had been nourished . “ Shall [I]99-francesca go and seek [the young lady]1022-the young lady ? ”[99-francesca] asked [Francesca]99-francesca , unable any longer to look on [a good maccaroni being cut with a knife]1195-a good maccaroni being cut with a knife . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher came out of [her]76-mrs. fisher reminiscent reflections with difficulty . “ [She]1022-the young lady knows lunch is at half - past twelve , ”[76-mrs. fisher] [she]76-mrs. fisher said . “ [They]2737-they all know . ”[76-mrs. fisher] “ [She]1022-the young lady may be asleep , ”[99-francesca] said [Francesca]99-francesca . “ [The other ladies]2725-the other ladies are further away , but this one is not far away . ”[99-francesca] “ Beat the gong again then , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher . What manners , [she]76-mrs. fisher thought ; what , what manners . It was not [an hotel]1148-an hotel , and considerations were due . [She]76-mrs. fisher must say [she]76-mrs. fisher was surprised at [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher , who had not looked like [somebody unpunctual]1197-somebody unpunctual . [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline , too — [she]75-lady caroline had seemed amiable and courteous , whatever else [she]75-lady caroline might be . From [the other one]1198-the other one , of course , [she]75-lady caroline expected nothing . [Francesca]99-francesca fetched the gong , and took it out into [the garden]507-the garden and advanced , beating it as [she]99-francesca advanced , close up to [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline , who , still stretched in [her]75-lady caroline low chair , waited till [she]75-lady caroline had done , and then turned [her]75-lady caroline head and in the sweetest tones poured forth what appeared to be music but was really invective . [Francesca]99-francesca did not recognise the liquid flow as invective ; how was [she]99-francesca to , when it came out sounding like that ? And with [her]99-francesca face all smiles , for [she]99-francesca could not but smile when [she]99-francesca looked at [this young lady]1200-this young lady , [she]99-francesca told [her]1200-this young lady the maccaroni was getting cold . “ When [I]1201-the irritated scrap do not come to meals it is because [I]1201-the irritated scrap do not wish to come to meals , ”[1201-the irritated scrap] said [the irritated Scrap]1201-the irritated scrap , “ and [you]99-francesca will not in future disturb [me]1201-the irritated scrap . ”[1201-the irritated scrap] “ Is [she]1200-this young lady ill ? ”[99-francesca] asked [Francesca]99-francesca , sympathetic but unable to stop smiling . Never , never had [she]99-francesca seen hair so beautiful . Like pure flax ; like the hair of [northern babes]1202-northern babes . On such a little head only blessing could rest , on such a little head the nimbus of [the holiest saints]1203-the holiest saints could fitly be placed . [Scrap]108-scrap shut [her]108-scrap eyes and refused to answer . In this [she]108-scrap was injudicious , for its effect was to convince [Francesca]99-francesca , who hurried away full of concern to tell [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , that [she]99-francesca was indisposed . And [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , being prevented , [she]99-francesca explained , from going out to [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline [herself]76-mrs. fisher because of [her]76-mrs. fisher stick , sent [the two others]1204-the two others instead , who had come in at that moment heated and breathless and full of excuses , while [she]99-francesca [herself]99-francesca proceeded to the next course , which was a very well - made omelette , bursting most agreeably at both its ends with young green peas . “ Serve [me]99-francesca , ”[99-francesca] [she]99-francesca directed [Francesca]99-francesca , who again showed a disposition to wait for [the others]949-the others . “ Oh , why wo n’t [they]949-the others leave [me]99-francesca alone?—oh , whywon’tthey leave [me]99-francesca alone ? ”[99-francesca] [Scrap]108-scrap asked [herself]108-scrap when [she]108-scrap heard more scrunchings on the little pebbles which took the place of grass , and therefore knew [some one else]358-some one else was approaching . [She]108-scrap kept [her]108-scrap eyes tight shut this time . Why should [she]108-scrap go in to lunch if [she]108-scrap did n’t want to ? This was n’t [a private house]1207-a private house ; [she]108-scrap was in no way tangled up in duties towards [a tiresome hostess]1208-a tiresome hostess . For all practical purposes [San Salvatore]14-san salvatore was [an hotel]1148-an hotel , and [she]108-scrap ought to be let alone to eat or not to eat exactly as if [she]108-scrap really had been in [an hotel]1148-an hotel . But [the unfortunate Scrap]108-scrap could not just sit still and close [her]108-scrap eyes without rousing that desire to stroke and pet in [her]108-scrap beholders with which [she]108-scrap was only too familiar . [Even the cook]1211-even the cook had patted [her]108-scrap . And now a gentle hand — how well [she]108-scrap knew and how much [she]108-scrap dreaded gentle hands — was placed on [her]108-scrap forehead . “ [I]76-mrs. fisher ’m afraid [you]108-scrap ’re not well , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said a voice that was not [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher ’s , and therefore must belong to [one of [the originals]929-the originals]1212-one of the originals . “ [I]108-scrap have a headache , ”[108-scrap] murmured [Scrap]108-scrap . Perhaps it was best to say that ; perhaps it was the shortest cut to peace . “ [I]108-scrap ’m so sorry , ”[108-scrap] said [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher softly , for it was [her]108-scrap hand being gentle . “ And [I]108-scrap , ”[108-scrap] said [Scrap]108-scrap to [herself]108-scrap , “ who thought if [I]108-scrap came [here]2640-here [I]108-scrap would escape [mothers]2740-mothers . ”[108-scrap] “ Do n’t [you]108-scrap think some tea would do [you]108-scrap good ? ”[76-mrs. fisher] asked [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher tenderly . Tea ? The idea was abhorrent to [Scrap]108-scrap . In this heat to be drinking tea in the middle of the day . . . “ No , ”[108-scrap] [she]108-scrap murmured . “ [I]76-mrs. fisher expect what would really be best for [her]1216-the freckled one , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said another voice , “ is to be left quiet . ”[76-mrs. fisher] How sensible , thought [Scrap]108-scrap ; and raised the eye - lashes of one eye just enough to peep through and see who was speaking . It was [the freckled original]1214-the freckled original . The dark one , then , was [the one with the hand]1215-the one with the hand . [The freckled one]1216-the freckled one rose in [her]108-scrap esteem . “ But [I]76-mrs. fisher ca n’t bear to think of [you]108-scrap with a headache and nothing being done for it , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher . “ Would a cup of strong black coffee — ? ”[76-mrs. fisher] [Scrap]108-scrap said no more . [She]108-scrap waited , motionless and dumb , till [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher should remove [her]108-scrap hand . After all , [she]108-scrap could n’t stand there all day , and when [she]108-scrap went away [she]108-scrap would have to take [her]108-scrap hand with [her]108-scrap . “ [I]1216-the freckled one do think , ”[1216-the freckled one] said [the freckled one]1216-the freckled one , “ that [she]108-scrap wants nothing except quiet . ”[1216-the freckled one] And perhaps [the freckled one]1216-the freckled one pulled [the one]1219-the one with the hand by the sleeve , for the hold on [Scrap]108-scrap ’s forehead relaxed , and after a minute ’s silence , during which no doubt [she]108-scrap was being contemplated — [she]108-scrap was always being contemplated — the footsteps began to scrunch the pebbles again , and grew fainter , and were gone . “ [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline has a headache , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher , re - entering [the dining - room]843-the dining - room and sitting down in [her]76-mrs. fisher place next to [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher . “ [I]76-mrs. fisher ca n’t persuade [her]75-lady caroline to have even a little tea , or some black coffee . Do [you]76-mrs. fisher know what aspirin is in Italian ? ”[76-mrs. fisher] “ The proper remedy for headaches , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher firmly , “ is castor oil . ”[76-mrs. fisher] “ But [she]75-lady caroline has n’t got a headache , ”[53-mrs. wilkins] said [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins . “ [Carlyle]77-carlyle , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , who had finished [her]76-mrs. fisher omelette and had leisure , while [she]76-mrs. fisher waited for the next course , to talk , “ suffered at one period terribly from headaches , and [he]77-carlyle constantly took castor oil as a remedy . There was no way of getting into or out of [the top garden]1084-the top garden at [San Salvatore]14-san salvatore except through the two glass doors , unfortunately side by side , of [the dining - room]843-the dining - room and [the hall]334-the hall . [A person in [the garden]507-the garden who wished to escape unseen could not , for [the person to be escaped from]1227-the person to be escaped from would be met on the way]1225-a person in the garden who wished to escape unseen could not , for the person to be escaped from would be met on the way . [It]507-the garden was [a small , oblong garden]1228-a small , oblong garden , and concealment was impossible . What trees there were — the Judas tree , the tamarisk , the umbrella - pine — grew close to the low parapets . Rose bushes gave no real cover ; one step to right or left of them , and [the person wishing to be private]1229-the person wishing to be private was discovered . Only [the north - west corner]1230-the north - west corner was a little place jutting out from the great wall , a kind of excrescence or loop , no doubt used in the old distrustful days for observation , where it was possible to sit really unseen , because between [it]507-the garden and [the house]404-the house was a thick clump of daphne . [Scrap]108-scrap , after glancing round to see that [no one]308-no one was looking , got up and carried [her]108-scrap chair into [this place]2743-this place , stealing away as carefully on tiptoe as those steal whose purpose is sin . There was another excrescence on the walls just like it at [the north - east corner]1234-the north - east corner , but this , though the view from [it]507-the garden was almost more beautiful , for from it [you]1235-you could see [the bay]725-the bay and [the lovely mountains behind [Mezzago]30-mezzago]1237-the lovely mountains behind mezzago , was exposed . No bushes grew near [it]507-the garden , nor had [it]507-the garden any shade . [The north - west loop]1238-the north - west loop then was where [she]108-scrap would sit , and [she]108-scrap settled into [it]1238-the north - west loop , and nestling [her]108-scrap head in [her]108-scrap cushion and putting [her]108-scrap feet comfortably on the parapet , from whence [they]1239-they appeared to [the villagers on [the piazza below]1241-the piazza below]1240-the villagers on the piazza below as two white doves , thought that now indeed [she]108-scrap would be safe . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher found [her]108-scrap there , guided by the smell of [her]108-scrap cigarette . [The incautious Scrap]108-scrap had not thought of that . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher did not smoke [herself]76-mrs. fisher , and all the more distinctly could [she]76-mrs. fisher smell the smoke of [others]307-others . The virile smell met [her]76-mrs. fisher directly [she]76-mrs. fisher went out into [the garden]507-the garden from [the dining - room]843-the dining - room after lunch in order to have [her]76-mrs. fisher coffee . [She]76-mrs. fisher had bidden [Francesca]99-francesca set the coffee in the shade of [the house]404-the house just outside the glass door , and when [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins , seeing a table being carried [there]207-there , reminded [her]76-mrs. fisher , very officiously and tactlessly [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher considered , that [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline wanted to be alone , [she]76-mrs. fisher retorted — and with what propriety — that [the garden]507-the garden was for [everybody]2599-everybody . Into [it]507-the garden accordingly [she]76-mrs. fisher went , and was immediately aware that [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline was smoking . [She]76-mrs. fisher said to [herself]76-mrs. fisher , “ [These modern young women]2744-these modern young women , ”[76-mrs. fisher] and proceeded to find [her]75-lady caroline ; [her]76-mrs. fisher stick , now that lunch was over , being no longer the hindrance to action that it was before [her]76-mrs. fisher meal had been securely , as [Browning]102-browning once said — surely it was [Browning]102-browning ? Yes , [she]76-mrs. fisher remembered how much diverted [she]76-mrs. fisher had been — roped in . [Nobody]225-nobody diverted [her]76-mrs. fisher now , reflected [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , making straight for the clump of daphne ; [the world]398-the world had grown very dull , and had entirely lost its sense of humour . Probably [they]1251-they still had [their]1251-they jokes , [these people]2626-these people — in fact [she]76-mrs. fisher knew [they]1251-they did , forPunchstill went on ; but how differently it went on , and what jokes . [Thackeray]116-thackeray , in [his]116-thackeray inimitable way , would have made mincemeat of [this generation]1176-this generation . Of how much it needed the tonic properties of that astringent pen it was of course unaware . It no longer even held [him]116-thackeray — at least , so [she]76-mrs. fisher had been informed — in any particular esteem . Well , [she]76-mrs. fisher could not give [it]1254-it eyes to see and ears to hear and a heart to understand , but [she]76-mrs. fisher could and would give it , represented and united in the form of [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline , a good dose of honest medicine . “ [I]76-mrs. fisher hear [you]116-thackeray are not well , ”[76-mrs. fisher] [she]76-mrs. fisher said , standing in the narrow entrance of [the loop]1255-the loop and looking down with the inflexible face of [one who is determined to do good at the motionless and apparently sleeping Scrap]1256-one who is determined to do good at the motionless and apparently sleeping scrap . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher had a deep voice , very like [a man]651-a man ’s , for [she]76-mrs. fisher had been overtaken by that strange masculinity that sometimes pursues [a woman]794-a woman during the last laps of [her]794-a woman life . [Scrap]108-scrap tried to pretend that [she]108-scrap was asleep , but if [she]108-scrap had been [her]108-scrap cigarette would not have been held in [her]108-scrap fingers but would have been lying on the ground . [She]76-mrs. fisher forgot this . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher did not , and coming inside [the loop]1255-the loop , sat down on a narrow stone seat built out of the wall . For a little [she]76-mrs. fisher could sit on it ; for a little , till the chill began to penetrate . [She]76-mrs. fisher contemplated the figure before [her]76-mrs. fisher . Undoubtedly [a pretty creature]878-a pretty creature , and one that would have had a success at [Farringford]38-farringford . Strange how easily even [the greatest men]1261-the greatest men were moved by exteriors . [She]76-mrs. fisher had seen with [her]76-mrs. fisher own eyes [Tennyson]79-tennyson turn away from [everybody]2599-everybody — turn , positively , [his]79-tennyson back on a crowd of [eminent people]1263-eminent people assembled to do [him]79-tennyson honour , and withdraw to the window with [a young person]1264-a young person [nobody]225-nobody had ever heard of , who had been brought [there]207-there by accident and whose one and only merit — if it be a merit , that which is conferred by chance — was beauty . [Beauty]117-beauty ! All over before [you]1267-you can turn round . An affair , one might almost say , of minutes . Well , while it lasted it did seem able to do what it liked with [men]797-men . Even [husbands]2697-husbands were not immune . There had been passages in the life of [Mr. Fisher]83-mr. fisher . . . “ [I]76-mrs. fisher expect the journey has upset [you]1267-you , ”[76-mrs. fisher] [she]76-mrs. fisher said in [her]76-mrs. fisher deep voice . “ What [you]1267-you want is a good dose of some simple medicine . [I]76-mrs. fisher shall ask [Domenico]88-domenico if there is such a thing in [the village]604-the village as castor oil . ”[76-mrs. fisher] [Scrap]108-scrap opened [her]108-scrap eyes and looked straight at [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher . “ Ah , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , “ [I]76-mrs. fisher knew [you]1267-you were not asleep . If [you]1267-you had been [you]1267-you would have let [your]1267-you cigarette fall to the ground . ”[76-mrs. fisher] [Scrap]108-scrap threw the cigarette over the parapet . “ Waste , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher . “ [I]76-mrs. fisher do n’t like smoking for [women]2746-women , but [I]76-mrs. fisher still less like waste . ”[76-mrs. fisher] “ Whatdoesone do with [people]274-people like this ? ”[108-scrap] [Scrap]108-scrap asked [herself]108-scrap , [her]108-scrap eyes fixed on [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher in what felt to [her]108-scrap an indignant stare but appeared to [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher as really charming docility . “ Now [you]1267-you ’ll take [my]76-mrs. fisher advice , ”[76-mrs. fisher] said [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , touched , “ and not neglect what may very well turn into an illness . [We]2748-we are in [Italy]13-italy , [you]1267-you know , and [one]229-one has to be careful . [You]1267-you ought , to begin with , to go to bed . ”[76-mrs. fisher] “ [I]108-scrap never go to bed , ”[108-scrap] snapped [Scrap]108-scrap ; and it sounded as moving , as forlorn , as that line spoken years and years ago by [an actress playing the part of [Poor Jo]118-poor jo]1270-an actress playing the part of poor jo in dramatised version of Bleak House—“I’m always moving on , ”[118-poor jo] said [Poor Jo]118-poor jo in this play , urged to do so by [a policeman]1271-a policeman ; and [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , then [a girl]2615-a girl , had laid [her]76-mrs. fisher head on the red velvet parapet of the front row of the dress circle and wept aloud . It was wonderful , [Scrap]108-scrap ’s voice . It had given [her]76-mrs. fisher , in the ten years since [she]76-mrs. fisher came out , all the triumphs that intelligence and wit can have , because it made whatever [she]76-mrs. fisher said seem memorable . [She]76-mrs. fisher ought , with a throat formation like that , to have been [a singer]1273-a singer , but in every kind of music [Scrap]108-scrap was dumb except this one music of the speaking voice ; and what a fascination , what a spell lay in that . Such was the loveliness of [her]76-mrs. fisher face and the beauty of [her]76-mrs. fisher colouring that there was not [a man into whose eyes]1274-a man into whose eyes at the sight of [her]76-mrs. fisher there did not leap a flame of intensest interest ; but , when [he]1274-a man into whose eyes heard [her]76-mrs. fisher voice , the flame in [that man]1275-that man ’s eyes was caught and fixed . It was the same with [every man]1276-every man , educated and uneducated , old , young , desirable [themselves]1277-themselves or undesirable , [men of [[her]76-mrs. fisher own world]1279-her own world]1278-men of her own world and [bus - conductors]1280-bus - conductors , [generals]1281-generals and [Tommies]1282-tommies — during the war [she]76-mrs. fisher had had a perplexing time — bishops equally with [vergers]1283-vergers — round about [her]76-mrs. fisher confirmation startling occurrences had taken place — wholesome and unwholesome , rich and penniless , brilliant or idiotic ; and it made no difference at all what [they]1284-they were , or how long and securely married : into the eyes of [every one of [them]1284-they]1285-every one of them , when [they]1284-they saw [her]76-mrs. fisher , leapt this flame , and when [they]1284-they heard [her]76-mrs. fisher it stayed there . [Scrap]108-scrap had had enough of this look . It only led to difficulties . At first it had delighted [her]108-scrap . [She]108-scrap had been excited , triumphant . To be apparently incapable of doing or saying the wrong thing , to be applauded , listened to , petted , adored wherever [she]108-scrap went , and when [she]108-scrap came [home]215-home to find nothing there either but the most indulgent proud fondness — why , how extremely pleasant . And so easy , too . No preparation necessary for this achievement , no hard work , nothing to learn . [She]108-scrap need take no trouble . [She]108-scrap had only to appear , and presently say something . But gradually experiences gathered round [her]108-scrap . After all , [she]108-scrap had to take trouble , [she]108-scrap had to make efforts , because , [she]108-scrap discovered with astonishment and rage , [she]108-scrap had to defend [herself]108-scrap . That look , that leaping look , meant that [she]108-scrap was going to be grabbed at . [Some of [those who had it]1288-those who had it]1287-some of those who had it were more humble than [others]307-others , especially if [they]1287-some of those who had it were young , but [they]1287-some of those who had it all , according to [their]1287-some of those who had it several ability , grabbed ; and [she]108-scrap who had entered [the world]398-the world so jauntily , with [her]108-scrap head in the air and the completest confidence in [anybody whose hair was grey , began to distrust , and then to dislike , and soon to shrink away from , and presently to be indignant]1291-anybody whose hair was grey , began to distrust , and then to dislike , and soon to shrink away from , and presently to be indignant . The war finished [Scrap]108-scrap . Since then [she]108-scrap had been embittered . [She]108-scrap was struggling as angrily in the sweet stuff of life as a wasp got caught in honey . Just as desperately did [she]108-scrap try to unstick [her]108-scrap wings . But [she]108-scrap never got a real answer , only further incoherence . A deep cynicism took hold of [the unhappy Scrap]108-scrap . [Her]108-scrap inside grew hoary with disillusionment , while [her]108-scrap gracious and charming outside continued to make [the world]398-the world more beautiful . What had the future in it for [her]108-scrap ? [She]108-scrap would not be able , after such a preparation , to take hold of it . [She]108-scrap was fit for nothing ; [she]108-scrap had wasted all this time being beautiful . Presently [she]108-scrap would n’t be beautiful , and what then ? [Scrap]108-scrap did n’t know what then , it appalled [her]108-scrap to wonder even . Tired as [she]108-scrap was of being conspicuous [she]108-scrap was at least used to that , [she]108-scrap had never known anything else ; and to become inconspicuous , to fade , to grow shabby and dim , would probably be most painful . And once [she]108-scrap began , what years and years of it there would be ! Imagine , thought [Scrap]108-scrap , having most of [one]229-one ’s life at the wrong end . Imagine being old for two or three times as long as being young . Stupid , stupid . Everything was stupid . There was n’t a thing [she]108-scrap wanted to do . There were thousands of things [she]108-scrap did n’t want to do . If [she]94-lotty went on like this , soon a nimbus might be expected round [her]94-lotty head , was there already , if [one]229-one did n’t know it was the sun through the tree - trunks catching [her]94-lotty sandy hair . A great desire to love and be [friends]2611-friends , to love [everybody]2599-everybody , to be friends with [everybody]2599-everybody , seemed to be invading [Lotty]94-lotty — a desire for sheer goodness . [Rose]95-rose ’s own experience was that goodness , the state of being good , was only reached with difficulty and pain . It took a long time to get to it ; in fact [one]229-one never did get to it , or , if for a flashing instant [one]229-one did , it was only for a flashing instant . Desperate perseverance was needed to struggle along its path , and all the way was dotted with doubts . [Lotty]94-lotty simply flew along . [She]94-lotty had certainly , thought [Rose]95-rose , not got rid of [her]94-lotty impetuousness . It had merely taken another direction . [She]94-lotty was now impetuously becoming [a saint]449-a saint . Could [one]229-one really attain goodness so violently ? At the evening meal , which was the first time [the whole four]1389-the whole four sat round the dining - room table together , [Scrap]108-scrap appeared . [She]108-scrap appeared quite punctually , and in one of those wrappers or tea - gowns which are sometimes described as ravishing . [This one]847-this one really was ravishing . It certainly ravished [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins , who could not take [her]53-mrs. wilkins eyes off [the enchanting figure opposite]1391-the enchanting figure opposite . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher had arrived at dinner feeling friendly towards [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline . [She]108-scrap at least had not intruded into [[her]108-scrap room]718-her room and sat at [her]108-scrap table and written with [her]108-scrap pen . [She]108-scrap did , [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher had supposed , know how to behave . Now it appeared that [she]108-scrap did not know , for was this behaving , to come dressed — no , undressed — like that to a meal ? Such behaviour was not only exceedingly improper but also most inconsiderate , for the indelicate creature would certainly catch a chill , and then infect [the entire party]1394-the entire party . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher had a great objection to [other people]2614-other people ’s chills . [They]1396-they were always the fruit of folly ; and then [they]1396-they were handed on to [her]76-mrs. fisher , who had done nothing at all to deserve [them]1396-they . “ Bird - brained , ”[76-mrs. fisher] thought [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , sternly contemplating [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline . “ Not an idea in [her]75-lady caroline head except vanity . ”[76-mrs. fisher] “ But there are [no men]2806-no men [here]2640-here , ”[53-mrs. wilkins] said [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins , “ so how can it be improper ? Seen from without , across the bowl of nasturtiums , it was the most beautiful of brief and dimpled smiles . [She]108-scrap had a very alive sort of face , that one , thought [Scrap]108-scrap , observing [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins with a dawn of interest . It was rather like a field of corn swept by lights and shadows . Both [she]108-scrap and [the dark one]808-the dark one , [Scrap]108-scrap noticed , had changed [their]1398-they clothes , but only in order to put on silk jumpers . The same amount of trouble would have been enough to dress [them]1398-they properly , reflected [Scrap]108-scrap . Naturally [they]1398-they looked like nothing on earth in the jumpers . It did n’t matter what [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher wore ; indeed , the only thing for [her]76-mrs. fisher , short of plumes and ermine , was what [she]76-mrs. fisher did wear . But these others were quite young still , and quite attractive . [They]1398-they really definitely had faces . How different life would be for [them]1398-they if [they]1398-they made the most of [themselves]1398-they instead of the least . And yet — [Scrap]108-scrap was suddenly bored , and turned away [her]108-scrap thoughts and absently ate toast . What did it matter ? If [you]1399-you did make the best of [yourself]1399-you , [you]1399-you only collected people round [you]1399-you who ended by wanting to grab . “ [I]53-mrs. wilkins ’ve had the most wonderful day , ”[53-mrs. wilkins] began [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins , [her]53-mrs. wilkins eyes shining . In fact , whenever [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins spoke [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher deliberately cast down [her]76-mrs. fisher eyes . Thus would [she]76-mrs. fisher mark [her]76-mrs. fisher disapproval . Besides , it seemed the only safe thing to do with [her]76-mrs. fisher eyes , for [no one]308-no one could tell what [the uncurbed creature]1401-the uncurbed creature would say next . That which [she]76-mrs. fisher had just said , for instance , about [men]797-men — addressed too , to [her]76-mrs. fisher — what could [she]76-mrs. fisher mean ? Better not conjecture , thought [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher ; and [her]76-mrs. fisher eyes , though cast down , yet saw [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline stretch out [her]75-lady caroline hand to the Chianti flask and fill [her]75-lady caroline glass again . Again . [She]76-mrs. fisher had done it once already , and the fish was only just going out of [the room]214-the room . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher could see that [the other respectable member of the party]1404-the other respectable member of the party , [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher , was noticing it too . [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher was , [she]76-mrs. fisher hoped and believed , respectable and well - meaning . It is true [she]76-mrs. fisher also had invaded [[her]76-mrs. fisher sitting - room]982-her sitting - room , but no doubt [she]76-mrs. fisher had been dragged [there]207-there by [the other one]1198-the other one , and [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher had little if anything against [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher , and observed with approval that [she]76-mrs. fisher only drank water . That was as it should be . So , indeed , to give [her]76-mrs. fisher [her]76-mrs. fisher dues , did [the freckled one]1216-the freckled one ; and very right at [their]1409-their age . [She]76-mrs. fisher [herself]76-mrs. fisher drank wine , but with what moderation : one meal , one glass . [You]76-mrs. fisher see — ”[53-mrs. wilkins] “ [I]76-mrs. fisher see nothing , ”[76-mrs. fisher] [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher could not this time refrain from interrupting — for what an intolerable trick . “ At the most [I]76-mrs. fisher hear , and that reluctantly . ”[76-mrs. fisher] But [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins , as impervious to rebuke as [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher had feared , immediately repeated the tiresome formula and launched out into a long and excessively indelicate speech about the best place for [the person [she]76-mrs. fisher called [Mellersh]53-mrs. wilkins to sleep in]1477-the person she called mellersh to sleep in . [Mellersh]53-mrs. wilkins — [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , remembering [the Thomases]131-the thomases and [Johns]132-johns and [Alfreds]133-alfreds and [Roberts]134-roberts of [her]76-mrs. fisher day , plain names that yet had all become glorious , thought it sheer affectation to be christened [Mellersh]53-mrs. wilkins — was , it seemed , [[Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins ’s husband]1478-mrs. wilkins ’s husband , and therefore [his]1478-mrs. wilkins ’s husband place was clearly indicated . Why this talk ? [She]76-mrs. fisher [herself]76-mrs. fisher , as if foreseeing [his]1478-mrs. wilkins ’s husband arrival , had had a second bed put in [[Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins ’s room]1479-mrs. wilkins ’s room . There were certain things in life which were never talked about but only done . Most things connected with [husbands]2697-husbands were not talked about ; and to have a whole dinner - table taken up with a discussion as to where one of [them]2697-husbands should sleep was an affront to the decencies . How and where [husbands]2697-husbands slept should be known only to [[their]2697-husbands wives]1482-their wives . Sometimes it was not known to [them]2697-husbands , and then the marriage had less happy moments ; but these moments were not talked about either ; the decencies continued to be preserved . At least , it was so in [her]76-mrs. fisher day . To have to hear whether [Mr. Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins should or should not sleep with [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins , and the reasons why [he]54-mr. wilkins should and the reasons why [he]54-mr. wilkins should n’t , was both uninteresting and indelicate . [She]76-mrs. fisher might have succeeded in imposing propriety and changing the conversation if it had not been for [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline . [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline encouraged [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins , and threw [herself]75-lady caroline into the discussion with every bit as much unreserve as [Mrs. Wilkins]1483-mrs. wilkins [herself]75-lady caroline . No doubt [she]75-lady caroline was impelled on this occasion by [Chianti]127-the chianti , but whatever the reason there it was . And , characteristically , [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline was all for [Mr. Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins being given [the solitary spare - room]1484-the solitary spare - room . [She]75-lady caroline took that for granted . Any other arrangement would be impossible , [she]75-lady caroline said ; [her]75-lady caroline expression was , “ Barbarous . ”[75-lady caroline] Had [she]76-mrs. fisher never read [her]76-mrs. fisher Bible , [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher was tempted to inquire — And [they]1485-they two shall be one flesh?Clearly also , then , [one room]2699-one room . But [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher did not inquire . [She]76-mrs. fisher did not care even to allude to such texts to [some one unmarried]1487-some one unmarried . However , there was one way [she]76-mrs. fisher could force [Mr. Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins into [his]54-mr. wilkins proper place and save the situation : [she]76-mrs. fisher could say [she]76-mrs. fisher [herself]76-mrs. fisher intended to invite [a friend]557-a friend . It was [her]76-mrs. fisher right . [They]1485-they had all said so . Apart from propriety , it was monstrous that [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins should want to monopolise [the one spare - room]2850-the one spare - room , when in [[her]53-mrs. wilkins own room]1490-her own room was everything necessary for [[her]53-mrs. wilkins husband]198-her husband . Perhaps [she]76-mrs. fisher really would invite [somebody]980-somebody — not invite , but suggest coming . There was [Kate Lumley]135-kate , for instance . [Kate]135-kate could perfectly afford to come and pay [her]135-kate share ; and [she]135-kate was of [her]135-kate own period and knew , and had known , [most of [the people [she]135-kate [herself]135-kate knew and had known]1494-the people she herself knew and had known]1493-most of the people she herself knew and had known . [Kate]135-kate , of course , had only been on the fringe ; [she]135-kate used to be asked only to the big parties , not to the small ones , and [she]135-kate still was only on the fringe . There were [some people who never got off the fringe]1495-some people who never got off the fringe , and [Kate]135-kate was one . Often , however , [such people]1496-such people were more permanently agreeable to be with than [the others]949-the others , in that [they]1496-such people remained grateful . Yes ; [she]76-mrs. fisher might really consider [Kate]135-kate . [The poor soul]1498-the poor soul had never married , but then [everybody]2599-everybody could not expect to marry , and [she]135-kate was quite comfortably off — not too comfortably , but just comfortably enough to pay [her]135-kate own expenses if [she]135-kate came and yet be grateful . Yes ; [Kate]135-kate was the solution . If [she]135-kate came , at one stroke , [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher saw , would [the Wilkinses]123-the wilkinses be regularised and [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins be prevented from having more than [[her]53-mrs. wilkins share of [the rooms]748-the rooms]1500-her share of the rooms . Also , [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher would save [herself]76-mrs. fisher from isolation ; spiritual isolation . [She]76-mrs. fisher desired physical isolation between meals , but [she]76-mrs. fisher disliked that isolation which is of the spirit . Such isolation would , [she]76-mrs. fisher feared , certainly be [hers]76-mrs. fisher with [these three alien - minded young women]1502-these three alien - minded young women . Even [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher was , owing to [her]76-mrs. fisher friendship with [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins , necessarily alien - minded . In [Kate]135-kate [she]76-mrs. fisher would have a support . [Kate]135-kate , without intruding on [[her]135-kate sitting - room]982-her sitting - room , for [Kate]135-kate was tractable , would be there at meals to support [her]135-kate . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher said nothing at the moment ; but presently in [the drawing - room]1504-the drawing - room , when [they]1502-these three alien - minded young women were gathered round the wood fire — [she]76-mrs. fisher had discovered there was no fireplace in [[her]76-mrs. fisher own sitting - room]873-her own sitting - room , and therefore [she]76-mrs. fisher would after all be forced , so long as the evenings remained cool , to spend [them]1506-them in [the other room]1507-the other room — presently , while [Francesca]99-francesca was handing coffee round and [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline was poisoning the air with smoke , [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins , looking relieved and pleased , said : “ Well , if [nobody]225-nobody really wants [that room]1125-that room , and would n’t use [it]1125-that room anyhow , [I]53-mrs. wilkins shall be very glad if [Mellersh]53-mrs. wilkins may have it . ”[53-mrs. wilkins] “ Of course [he]225-nobody must have it , ”[75-lady caroline] said [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline .
