[Scrap]108-scrap wanted to know so much about [[her]2327-her mother]1020-her mother that [Arundel]172-mr. arundel had presently to invent . [He]2326-he would talk about anything [she]2327-her wished if only [he]2326-he might be with [her]2327-her for a while and see [her]2327-her and hear [her]2327-her , but [he]2326-he knew very little of [the Droitwiches]152-the droitwiches and [[their]152-the droitwiches friends]2330-their friends really — beyond meeting [them]152-the droitwiches at those bigger functions where literature is also represented , and amusing [them]152-the droitwiches at luncheons and dinners , [he]2326-he knew very little of [them]152-the droitwiches really . To [them]152-the droitwiches [he]2326-he had always remained [Mr. Arundel]172-mr. arundel ; [no one]308-no one called [him]2326-he [Ferdinand]172-mr. arundel ; and [he]2326-he only knew the gossip also available to the evening papers and [the frequenters of clubs]2332-the frequenters of clubs . But [he]2326-he was , however , good at inventing ; and as soon as [he]2326-he had come to an end of first - hand knowledge , in order to answer [her]2327-her inquiries and keep [her]2327-her there to [himself]2326-he [he]2326-he proceeded to invent . It was quite easy to fasten some of the entertaining things [he]2326-he was constantly thinking on to [other people]2614-other people and pretend they were [theirs]2614-other people . [Scrap]108-scrap , who had that affection for [[her]2327-her parents]1082-her parents which warms in absence , was athirst for news , and became more and more interested by the news [he]2326-he gradually imparted . At first it was ordinary news . [He]2326-he had met [[her]2327-her mother]1020-her mother [here]2640-here , and seen [her]1020-her mother there . [She]1020-her mother looked very well ; [she]1020-her mother said so and so . But presently the things [Lady Droitwich]156-lady droitwich had said took on an unusual quality : they became amusing . “ [Mother]1427-mother saidthat ? ”[108-scrap] [Scrap]108-scrap interrupted , surprised . And presently [Lady Droitwich]156-lady droitwich began to do amusing things as well as say them . “ Motherdid that ? ”[108-scrap] [Scrap]108-scrap inquired , wide - eyed . [Arundel]172-mr. arundel warmed to [his]172-mr. arundel work . [He]172-mr. arundel fathered some of the most entertaining ideas [he]172-mr. arundel had lately had on to [Lady Droitwich]156-lady droitwich , and also any charming funny things that had been done — or might have been done , for [he]172-mr. arundel could imagine almost anything . [Scrap]108-scrap ’s eyes grew round with wonder and affectionate pride in [[her]108-scrap mother]1020-her mother . Why , but how funny — fancy [mother]1427-mother . What [an old darling]2339-an old darling . Did [she]1020-her mother really do that ? How perfectly adorable of [her]1020-her mother . And did [she]1020-her mother really say — but how wonderful of [her]1020-her mother to think of it . What sort of a face did [Lloyd George]154-lloyd george make ? [She]108-scrap laughed and laughed , and had a great longing to hug [[her]108-scrap mother]1020-her mother , and the time flew , and it grew quite dusk , and it grew nearly dark , and [Mr. Arundel]172-mr. arundel still went on amusing [her]108-scrap , and it was a quarter to eight before [she]108-scrap suddenly remembered dinner . “ Oh , good heavens ! ”[108-scrap] [she]108-scrap exclaimed , jumping up . “ Yes . It ’s late , ”[172-mr. arundel] said [Arundel]172-mr. arundel . “ [I]1020-her mother ’ll go on quickly and send [the maid]3003-the maid to [you]108-scrap . [I]1020-her mother must run , or [I]1020-her mother ’ll never be ready in time — ”[1020-her mother] And [she]1020-her mother was gone up [the path]691-the path with the swiftness of a young , slender deer . [Arundel]172-mr. arundel followed . [He]172-mr. arundel did not wish to arrive too hot , so had to go slowly . Fortunately [he]172-mr. arundel was near the top , and [Francesca]99-francesca came down [the pergola]909-the pergola to pilot [him]172-mr. arundel indoors , and having shown [him]172-mr. arundel where [he]172-mr. arundel could wash [she]99-francesca put [him]172-mr. arundel in [the empty drawing - room]2343-the empty drawing - room to cool [himself]172-mr. arundel by the crackling wood fire . [He]172-mr. arundel got as far away from the fire as [he]172-mr. arundel could , and stood in one of the deep window - recesses looking out at the distant lights of [Mezzago]30-mezzago . [The drawing - room]1504-the drawing - room door was open , and [the house]404-the house was quiet with the hush that precedes dinner , when [the inhabitants]2346-the inhabitants are all shut up in [[their]2346-the inhabitants rooms]1724-their rooms dressing . [Briggs]72-briggs in [[his]72-briggs room]2238-his room was throwing away spoilt tie after spoilt tie ; [Scrap]108-scrap in [hers]108-scrap was hurrying into a black frock with a vague notion that [Mr. Briggs]72-briggs would n’t be able to see [her]108-scrap so clearly in black ; [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher was fastening the lace shawl , which nightly transformed [her]76-mrs. fisher day dress into [her]76-mrs. fisher evening dress , with the brooch [Ruskin]101-ruskin had given [her]76-mrs. fisher on [her]76-mrs. fisher marriage , formed of two pearl lilies tied together by a blue enamel ribbon on which was written in gold lettersEsto perpetua;Mr . [Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins was sitting on the edge of [his]54-mr. wilkins bed brushing [[his]54-mr. wilkins wife]238-his wife ’s hair — thus far in this third week had [he]54-mr. wilkins progressed in demonstrativeness — while [she]238-his wife , for [her]238-his wife part , sitting on a chair in front of [him]54-mr. wilkins , put [his]54-mr. wilkins studs in a clean shirt ; and [Rose]73-rose , ready dressed , sat at [her]73-rose window considering [her]73-rose day . [Rose]73-rose was quite aware of what had happened to [Mr. Briggs]72-briggs . If [she]73-rose had had any difficulty about it , [Lotty]94-lotty would have removed it by the frank comments [she]73-rose made while [she]73-rose and [Rose]73-rose sat together after tea on the wall . [Lotty]94-lotty was delighted at more love being introduced into [San Salvatore]14-san salvatore , even if it were only one - sided , and said that when once [[Rose]73-rose ’s husband]2350-rose ’s husband was [there]207-there [she]94-lotty did n’t suppose , now that [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher too had at last come unglued — [Rose]73-rose protested at the expression , and [Lotty]94-lotty retorted that it was in [Keats]81-keats — there would be [another place in [the world more swarming with happiness]2353-the world more swarming with happiness than [San Salvatore]14-san salvatore]2352-another place in the world more swarming with happiness than san salvatore . “ [[Your]73-rose husband]2628-your husband , ”[94-lotty] said [Lotty]94-lotty , swinging [her]94-lotty feet , “ might be [here]2640-here quite soon , perhaps to - morrow evening if [he]2628-your husband starts at once , and there ’ll be a glorious final few days before [we]3006-we all go [home]215-home refreshed for life . [I]94-lotty do n’t believe any of [us]3006-we will ever be the same again — and [I]94-lotty would n’t be a bit surprised if [Caroline]75-lady caroline does n’t end by getting fond of [the young man Briggs]3008-the young man briggs . It ’s in the air . [Youhaveto]73-rose get fond of [people]274-people here . ”[94-lotty] [Rose]73-rose sat at [her]73-rose window thinking of these things . [Lotty]94-lotty ’s optimism . . . yet it had been justified by [Mr. Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins ; and look , too , at [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher . If only it would come true as well about [Frederick]65-frederick ! For [Rose]73-rose , who between lunch and tea had left off thinking about [Frederick]65-frederick , was now , between tea and dinner , thinking of [him]65-frederick harder than ever . It had been funny and delightful , that little interlude of admiration , but of course it could n’t go on once [Caroline]75-lady caroline appeared . [Rose]73-rose knew [[her]73-rose place]2354-her place . [She]73-rose could see as well as [any one]2617-any one the unusual , the unique loveliness of [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline . How warm , though , things like admiration and appreciation made [one]229-one feel , how capable of really deserving them , how different , how glowing . [They]2357-they seemed to quicken unsuspected faculties into life . [She]73-rose was sure [she]73-rose had been [a thoroughly amusing woman]2358-a thoroughly amusing woman between lunch and tea , and [a pretty one]2359-a pretty one too . [She]73-rose was quite certain [she]73-rose had been pretty ; [she]73-rose saw it in [Mr. Briggs]72-briggs ’s eyes as clearly as in a looking - glass . For a brief space , [she]73-rose thought , [she]73-rose had been like [a torpid fly brought back to gay buzzing by the lighting of a fire]2360-a torpid fly brought back to gay buzzing by the lighting of a fire in [a wintry room]2361-a wintry room . [She]73-rose still buzzed , [she]73-rose still tingled , just at the remembrance . What fun it had been , having [an admirer even]2362-an admirer even for that little while . No wonder [people]274-people liked [admirers]2364-admirers . [They]2364-admirers seemed , in some strange way , to make [one]229-one come alive . Although it was all over [she]73-rose still glowed with it and felt more exhilarated , more optimistic , more as [Lotty]94-lotty probably constantly felt , than [she]73-rose had done since [she]73-rose was [a girl]2615-a girl . [She]73-rose dressed with care , though [she]73-rose knew [Mr. Briggs]72-briggs would no longer see [her]73-rose , but it gave [her]73-rose pleasure to see how pretty , while [she]73-rose was about it , [she]73-rose could make [herself]73-rose look ; and very nearly [she]73-rose stuck a crimson camellia in [her]73-rose hair down by [her]73-rose ear . [She]73-rose did hold it there for a minute , and it looked almost sinfully attractive and was exactly the colour of [her]73-rose mouth , but [she]73-rose took it out again with a smile and a sigh and put it in the proper place for flowers , which is water . [She]73-rose must n’t be silly , [she]73-rose thought . Think of [the poor]219-the poor . Soon [she]73-rose would be back with [them]219-the poor again , and what would a camellia behind [her]73-rose ear seem like then ? Simply fantastic . But on one thing [she]73-rose was determined : the first thing [she]73-rose would do when [she]73-rose got [home]215-home would be to have it out with [Frederick]65-frederick . If [he]65-frederick did n’t come to [San Salvatore]14-san salvatore that is what [she]73-rose would do — the very first thing . Long ago [she]73-rose ought to have done this , but always [she]73-rose had been handicapped , when [she]73-rose tried to , by being so dreadfully fond of [him]65-frederick and so much afraid that fresh wounds were going to be given [her]73-rose wretched , soft heart . But now let [him]65-frederick wound [her]73-rose as much as [he]65-frederick chose , as much as [he]65-frederick possibly could , [she]73-rose would still have it out with [him]65-frederick . Not that [he]65-frederick ever intentionally wounded [her]73-rose ; [she]73-rose knew [he]65-frederick never meant to , [she]73-rose knew [he]65-frederick often had no idea of having done it . For [a person who wrote books]2369-a person who wrote books , thought [Rose]73-rose , [Frederick]65-frederick did n’t seem to have much imagination . Anyhow , [she]73-rose said to [herself]73-rose , getting up from the dressing - table , things could n’t go on like this . [She]73-rose would have it out with [him]65-frederick . This separate life , this freezing loneliness , [she]73-rose had had enough of it . Why should n’t [she]73-rose too be happy ? Why on [earth]2370-earth — the energetic expression matched [her]73-rose mood of rebelliousness — shouldn’t [she]73-rose too be loved and allowed to love ? [She]73-rose looked at [her]73-rose little clock . Still ten minutes before dinner . Tired of staying in [[her]73-rose bedroom]1056-her bedroom [she]73-rose thought [she]73-rose would go on to [[Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher ’s battlements]2372-mrs. fisher ’s battlements , which would be empty at this hour , and watch the moon rise out of [the sea]265-the sea . [She]73-rose went into [the deserted upper hall]2374-the deserted upper hall with this intention , but was attracted on [her]73-rose way along [it]2374-the deserted upper hall by the firelight shining through the open door of [the drawing - room]1504-the drawing - room . How gay [it]1504-the drawing - room looked . The fire transformed [the room]214-the room . [A dark , ugly room]2377-a dark , ugly room in the daytime , [it]214-the room was transformed just as [she]73-rose had been transformed by the warmth of — no , [she]73-rose would n’t be silly ; [she]73-rose would think of [the poor]219-the poor ; the thought of [them]219-the poor always brought [her]73-rose down to sobriety at once . [She]73-rose peeped in . Firelight and flowers ; and outside the deep slits of windows hung the blue curtain of the night . How pretty . What [a sweet place [San Salvatore]14-san salvatore was]2379-a sweet place san salvatore was . And that gorgeous lilac on the table — [she]73-rose must go and put [her]73-rose face in it . . . But [she]73-rose never got to the lilac . [She]73-rose went one step towards [it]2380-it , and then stood still , for [she]73-rose had seen the figure looking out of the window in the farthest corner , and it was [Frederick]65-frederick . All the blood in [Rose]73-rose ’s body rushed to [her]73-rose heart and seemed to stop its beating . [Frederick]65-frederick . Come . [She]73-rose stood quite still . [He]65-frederick had not heard [her]73-rose . [He]65-frederick did not turn round . [She]73-rose stood looking at [him]65-frederick . The miracle had happened , and [he]65-frederick had come . [She]73-rose stood holding [her]73-rose breath . So [he]65-frederick needed [her]73-rose , for [he]65-frederick had come instantly . So [he]65-frederick too must have been thinking , longing . . . [Her]73-rose heart , which had seemed to stop beating , was suffocating [her]73-rose now , the way it raced along . [Frederick]65-frederick did love [her]73-rose then — [he]65-frederick must love [her]73-rose , or why had [he]65-frederick come ? Something , perhaps [her]73-rose absence , had made [him]65-frederick turn to [her]73-rose , want [her]73-rose . . . and now the understanding [she]73-rose had made up [her]73-rose mind to have with [him]65-frederick would be quite — would be quite — easy — [Her]73-rose thoughts would n’t go on . [Her]73-rose mind stammered . [She]73-rose could n’t think . [She]73-rose could only see and feel . [She]73-rose did n’t know how it had happened . It was a miracle . [God]63-god could do miracles . [God]63-god had done this one . [God]63-god could — [God]63-god could — could — [Her]73-rose mind stammered again , and broke off . “ [Frederick]65-frederick — ”[73-rose] [she]73-rose tried to say ; but no sound came , or if it did the crackling of the fire covered it up . [She]73-rose must go nearer . [She]73-rose began to creep towards [him]65-frederick — softly , softly . [He]65-frederick did not move . [He]65-frederick had not heard . [She]73-rose stole nearer and nearer , and the fire crackled and [he]65-frederick heard nothing . [She]73-rose stopped a moment , unable to breathe . [She]73-rose was afraid . Suppose [he]65-frederick — suppose [he]65-frederick — oh , but [he]65-frederick had come , [he]65-frederick had come . [She]73-rose went on again , close up to [him]65-frederick , and [her]73-rose heart beat so loud that [she]73-rose thought [he]65-frederick must hear it . And could n’t [he]65-frederick feel — didn’t [he]65-frederick know — “ [Frederick]65-frederick , ”[73-rose] [she]73-rose whispered , hardly able even to whisper , choked by the beating of [her]73-rose heart . [He]65-frederick spun round on [his]65-frederick heels . “ [Rose]73-rose ! ”[65-frederick] [he]65-frederick exclaimed , staring blankly . But [she]73-rose did not see [his]65-frederick stare , for [her]73-rose arms were round [his]65-frederick neck , and [her]73-rose cheek was against [his]65-frederick , and [she]73-rose was murmuring , [her]73-rose lips on [his]65-frederick ear , “ [I]73-rose knew [you]65-frederick would come — in [my]73-rose very heart [I]73-rose always , always knew [you]65-frederick would come — ”[73-rose]

Now [Frederick]65-frederick was not the man to hurt anything if [he]65-frederick could help it ; besides , [he]65-frederick was completely bewildered . Not only was [[his]65-frederick wife]238-his wife here — [here]2640-here , of all places in [the world]398-the world — but [she]238-his wife was clinging to [him]65-frederick as [she]238-his wife had not clung for years , and murmuring love , and welcoming [him]65-frederick . If [she]238-his wife welcomed [him]65-frederick [she]238-his wife must have been expecting [him]65-frederick . Strange as this was , it was the only thing in the situation which was evident — that , and the softness of [her]238-his wife cheek against [his]65-frederick , and the long - forgotten sweet smell of [her]238-his wife . [Frederick]65-frederick was bewildered . But not being [the man to hurt anything]2384-the man to hurt anything if [he]65-frederick could help it [he]65-frederick too put [his]65-frederick arms round [her]238-his wife , and having put them round [her]238-his wife [he]65-frederick also kissed [her]238-his wife ; and presently [he]65-frederick was kissing [her]238-his wife almost as tenderly as [she]238-his wife was kissing [him]65-frederick ; and presently [he]65-frederick was kissing [her]238-his wife quite as tenderly ; and again presently [he]65-frederick was kissing [her]238-his wife more tenderly , and just as if [he]65-frederick had never left off . [He]65-frederick was bewildered , but [he]65-frederick still could kiss . It seemed curiously natural to be doing it . It made [him]65-frederick feel as if [he]65-frederick were thirty again instead of forty , and [Rose]73-rose were [his]65-frederick Rose of twenty , the Rose [he]65-frederick had so much adored before [she]238-his wife began to weigh what [he]65-frederick did with [her]238-his wife idea of right , and the balance went against [him]65-frederick , and [she]238-his wife had turned strange , and stony , and more and more shocked , and oh , so lamentable . [He]65-frederick could n’t get at [her]238-his wife in those days at all ; [she]238-his wife would n’t , [she]238-his wife could n’t understand . [She]238-his wife kept on referring everything to what [she]238-his wife called [God]63-god ’s eyes — in [God]63-god ’s eyes it could n’t be right , it was n’t right . [Her]238-his wife miserable face — whatever [her]238-his wife principles did for [her]238-his wife they did n’t make [her]238-his wife happy — [her]238-his wife little miserable face , twisted with effort to be patient , had been at last more than [he]65-frederick could bear to see , and [he]65-frederick had kept away as much as [he]65-frederick could . [She]238-his wife never ought to have been [the daughter of [a low - church rector]2386-a low - church rector]2385-the daughter of a low - church rector — [narrow devil]2387-narrow devil ; [she]238-his wife was quite unfitted to stand up against such an upbringing . What had happened , why [she]238-his wife was here , why [she]238-his wife was [[his]65-frederick Rose]2388-his rose again , passed [his]65-frederick comprehension ; and meanwhile , and until such time as [he]65-frederick understood , [he]65-frederick still could kiss . In fact [he]65-frederick could not stop kissing ; and it was [he]65-frederick now who began to murmur , to say love things in [her]238-his wife ear under the hair that smelt so sweet and tickled [him]65-frederick just as [he]65-frederick remembered it used to tickle [him]65-frederick . And as [he]65-frederick held [her]238-his wife close to [his]65-frederick heart and [her]238-his wife arms were soft round [his]65-frederick neck , [he]65-frederick felt stealing over [him]65-frederick a delicious sense of — at first [he]65-frederick did n’t know what it was , this delicate , pervading warmth , and then [he]65-frederick recognised it as security . Yes ; security . No need now to be ashamed of [his]65-frederick figure , and to make jokes about it so as to forestall [other people]2614-other people ’s and show [he]65-frederick did n’t mind it ; no need now to be ashamed of getting hot going up [hills]2390-hills , or to torment [himself]65-frederick with pictures of how [he]65-frederick probably appeared to [beautiful young women]2391-beautiful young women — how middle - aged , how absurd in [his]65-frederick inability to keep away from [them]2391-beautiful young women . [Rose]73-rose cared nothing for such things . With [her]73-rose [he]65-frederick was safe . To [her]73-rose [he]65-frederick was [[her]73-rose lover]339-her lover , as [he]65-frederick used to be ; and [she]73-rose would never notice or mind any of the ignoble changes that getting older had made in [him]65-frederick and would go on making more and more . [Frederick]65-frederick continued , therefore , with greater and greater warmth and growing delight to kiss [[his]65-frederick wife]238-his wife , and the mere holding of [her]238-his wife in [his]65-frederick arms caused [him]65-frederick to forget everything else . How could [he]65-frederick , for instance , remember or think of [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline , to mention only one of the complications with which [his]65-frederick situation bristled , when here was [[his]65-frederick sweet wife]2394-his sweet wife , miraculously restored to [him]65-frederick , whispering with [her]238-his wife cheek against [his]65-frederick in the dearest , most romantic words how much [she]238-his wife loved [him]65-frederick , how terribly [she]238-his wife had missed [him]65-frederick ? [He]65-frederick did for one brief instant , for even in moments of love there are brief instants of lucid thought , recognise the immense power of [the woman]796-the woman present and being actually held compared to that of the woman , however beautiful , who is somewhere else , but that is as far as [he]65-frederick got towards remembering [Scrap]108-scrap ; no farther . [She]238-his wife was like a dream , fleeing before the morning light . “ When did [you]65-frederick start ? ”[73-rose] murmured [Rose]73-rose , [her]73-rose mouth on [his]65-frederick ear . [She]73-rose could n’t let [him]65-frederick go ; not even to talk [she]73-rose could n’t let [him]65-frederick go . “ Yesterday morning , ”[65-frederick] murmured [Frederick]65-frederick , holding [her]238-his wife close . [He]65-frederick could n’t let [her]238-his wife go either . “ Oh — the very instant then , ”[73-rose] murmured [Rose]73-rose . This was cryptic , but [Frederick]65-frederick said , “ Yes , the very instant , ”[65-frederick] and kissed [her]238-his wife neck . “ How quickly [my]73-rose letter got to [you]65-frederick , ”[73-rose] murmured [Rose]73-rose , whose eyes were shut in the excess of [her]238-his wife happiness . “ Did n’t it , ”[65-frederick] said [Frederick]65-frederick , who felt like shutting [his]65-frederick eyes [himself]65-frederick . So there had been a letter . Soon , no doubt , light would be vouchsafed [him]65-frederick , and meanwhile this was so strangely , touchingly sweet , this holding [his]65-frederick Rose to [his]65-frederick heart again after all the years , that [he]65-frederick could n’t bother to try to guess anything . Oh , [he]65-frederick had been happy during these years , because it was not in [him]65-frederick to be unhappy ; besides , how many interests life had had to offer [him]65-frederick , how many [friends]2611-friends , how much success , how many women only too willing to help [him]65-frederick to blot out the thought of [the altered , petrified , pitiful little wife at [home]215-home who would n’t spend [his]65-frederick money , who was appalled by [his]65-frederick books , who drifted away and away from [him]65-frederick , and always if [he]65-frederick tried to have it out with [her]73-rose]2397-the altered , petrified , pitiful little wife at home who would n’t spend his money , who was appalled by his books , who drifted away and away from him , and always if he tried to have it out with her asked [him]65-frederick with patient obstinacy what [he]65-frederick thought the things [he]65-frederick wrote and lived by looked in the eyes of [God]63-god . “ [No one]308-no one , ”[73-rose] [she]73-rose said once , “ should ever write a book [God]63-god would n’t like to read . That is the test , [Frederick]65-frederick . ”[73-rose] And [he]65-frederick had laughed hysterically , burst into a great shriek of laughter , and rushed out of [the house]404-the house , away from [her]73-rose solemn little face — away from [her]73-rose pathetic , solemn little face . . . But this [Rose]73-rose was [his]65-frederick youth again , the best part of [his]65-frederick life , the part of it that had had all the visions in it and all the hopes . How [they]2400-they had dreamed together , [he]65-frederick and [she]73-rose , before [he]65-frederick struck that vein of memoirs ; how [they]2400-they had planned , and laughed , and loved . [They]2400-they had lived for a while in the very heart of poetry . After the happy days came the happy nights , the happy , happy nights , with [her]73-rose asleep close against [his]65-frederick heart , with [her]73-rose when [he]65-frederick woke in the morning still close against [his]65-frederick heart , for [they]2400-they hardly moved in [their]2400-they deep , happy sleep . It was wonderful to have it all come back to [him]65-frederick at the touch of [her]73-rose , at the feel of [her]73-rose face against [his]65-frederick — wonderful that [she]73-rose should be able to give [him]65-frederick back [his]65-frederick youth . “ Sweetheart — sweetheart , ”[65-frederick] [he]65-frederick murmured , overcome by remembrance , clinging to [her]73-rose now in [his]65-frederick turn . “ [Beloved husband]3011-beloved husband , ”[73-rose] [she]73-rose breathed — the bliss of it — the sheer bliss . . . [Briggs]72-briggs , coming in a few minutes before the gong went on the chance that [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline might be [there]207-there , was much astonished . [He]72-briggs had supposed [Rose Arbuthnot]73-rose was [a widow]441-a widow , and [he]72-briggs still supposed it ; so that [he]72-briggs was much astonished . “ Well [I]72-briggs ’m damned , ”[72-briggs] thought [Briggs]72-briggs , quite clearly and distinctly , for the shock of what [he]72-briggs saw in the window startled [him]72-briggs so much that for a moment [he]72-briggs was shaken free of [his]72-briggs own confused absorption . Aloud [he]65-frederick said , very red , “ Oh [I]65-frederick say — [I]65-frederick beg [your]2404-they pardon”—and[65-frederick] then stood hesitating , and wondering whether [he]65-frederick ought n’t to go back to [[his]65-frederick bedroom]2403-his bedroom again . If [he]65-frederick had said nothing [they]2404-they would not have noticed [he]65-frederick was [there]207-there , but when [he]65-frederick begged [their]2404-they pardon [Rose]73-rose turned and looked at [him]65-frederick as one looks who is trying to remember , and [Frederick]65-frederick looked at [him]65-frederick too without at first quite seeing [him]65-frederick . [They]2404-they did n’t seem , thought [Briggs]72-briggs , to mind or to be at all embarrassed . [He]65-frederick could n’t be [[her]73-rose brother]998-her brother ; [no brother]2407-no brother ever brought that look into [a woman]794-a woman ’s face . It was very awkward . If [they]2404-they did n’t mind , [he]65-frederick did . It upset [him]65-frederick to come across [[his]65-frederick Madonna]2409-his madonna forgetting [herself]2409-his madonna . “ Is this one of [[your]65-frederick friends]3012-your friends ? ”[65-frederick] [Frederick]65-frederick was able after an instant to ask [Rose]73-rose , who made no attempt to introduce [the young man]2410-the young man standing awkwardly in front of [them]2404-they but continued to gaze at [him]2410-the young man with a kind of abstracted , radiant goodwill . “ It ’s [Mr. Briggs]72-briggs , ”[73-rose] said [Rose]73-rose , recognizing [him]2410-the young man . “ This is [[my]73-rose husband]2595-my husband , ”[73-rose] [she]73-rose added . And [Briggs]72-briggs , shaking hands , just had time to think how surprising it was to have [a husband]282-a husband when [you]2412-you were [a widow]441-a widow before the gong sounded , and [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline would be there in a minute , and [he]72-briggs ceased to be able to think at all , and merely became a thing with its eyes fixed on the door . Through the door immediately entered , in what seemed to [him]72-briggs an endless procession , first [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , very stately in [her]76-mrs. fisher evening lace shawl and brooch , who when [she]76-mrs. fisher saw [him]72-briggs at once relaxed into smiles and benignity , only to stiffen , however , when [she]76-mrs. fisher caught sight of [the stranger]2414-the stranger ; then [Mr. Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins , cleaner and neater and more carefully dressed and brushed than [any man on earth]2415-any man on earth ; and then , tying something hurriedly as [she]76-mrs. fisher came , [Mrs. Wilkins]53-mrs. wilkins ; and then [nobody]225-nobody . [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline was late . Where was [she]75-lady caroline ? Had [she]75-lady caroline heard the gong ? Ought n’t it to be beaten again ? Suppose [she]75-lady caroline did n’t come to dinner after all . . . [Briggs]72-briggs went cold . “ Introduce [me]65-frederick , ”[65-frederick] said [Frederick]65-frederick on [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher ’s entrance , touching [Rose]73-rose ’s elbow . “ [[My]73-rose husband]2595-my husband , ”[73-rose] said [Rose]73-rose , holding [him]72-briggs by the hand , [her]73-rose face exquisite . “ This , ”[76-mrs. fisher] thought [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher , “ must now be the last of [the husbands]3015-the husbands , unless [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline produces one from up [her]75-lady caroline sleeve . ”[76-mrs. fisher] But [she]76-mrs. fisher received [him]72-briggs graciously , for [he]72-briggs certainly looked exactly like [a husband]282-a husband , not at all like one of [those people who go about abroad pretending [they]2418-those people who go about abroad pretending they are husbands when they are not are [husbands]2697-husbands when [they]2418-those people who go about abroad pretending they are husbands when they are not are not]2418-those people who go about abroad pretending they are husbands when they are not , and said [she]76-mrs. fisher supposed [he]72-briggs had come to accompany [[his]72-briggs wife]238-his wife [home]215-home at the end of the month , and remarked that now [the house]404-the house would be completely full . “ So that , ”[76-mrs. fisher] [she]76-mrs. fisher added , smiling at [Briggs]72-briggs , “ [we]3016-we shall at last really be getting [our]3016-we money ’s worth . ”[76-mrs. fisher] [Briggs]72-briggs grinned automatically , because [he]72-briggs was just able to realise that [somebody]980-somebody was being playful with [him]72-briggs , but [he]72-briggs had not heard [her]76-mrs. fisher and [he]72-briggs did not look at [her]76-mrs. fisher . Not only were [his]72-briggs eyes fixed on the door but [his]72-briggs whole body was concentrated on it . Introduced in [his]72-briggs turn , [Mr. Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins was most hospitable and called [Frederick]65-frederick “ [sir]3017-sir . ”[65-frederick] “ Well , [sir]3017-sir , ”[54-mr. wilkins] said [Mr. Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins heartily , “ here [we]3019-we are , here [we]3019-we are”—and[54-mr. wilkins] having gripped [his]72-briggs hand with an understanding that only was n’t mutual because [Arbuthnot]73-rose did not yet know what [he]72-briggs was in for in the way of trouble , [he]54-mr. wilkins looked at [him]72-briggs as [a man]651-a man should , squarely in the eyes , and allowed [his]72-briggs look to convey as plainly as a look can that in [him]72-briggs would be found staunchness , integrity , reliability — in fact [a friend in need]2425-a friend in need . [Mrs. Arbuthnot]76-mrs. fisher was very much flushed , [Mr. Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins noticed . [He]54-mr. wilkins had not seen [her]76-mrs. fisher flushed like that before . “ Well , [I]54-mr. wilkins ’m [[their]3020-their man]2148-their man , ”[54-mr. wilkins] [he]54-mr. wilkins thought . [Lotty]94-lotty ’s greeting was effusive . It was done with both hands . “ Did n’t [I]94-lotty tell [you]54-mr. wilkins ? ”[94-lotty] [she]94-lotty laughed to [Rose]73-rose over [her]94-lotty shoulder while [Frederick]65-frederick was shaking [her]94-lotty hands in both [his]65-frederick . “ What did [you]54-mr. wilkins tell [her]2427-the sandy but agreeable young woman ? ”[65-frederick] asked [Frederick]65-frederick , in order to say something . The way [they]2426-they were all welcoming [him]65-frederick was confusing . [They]2426-they had evidently all expected [him]65-frederick , not only [Rose]73-rose . [The sandy but agreeable young woman]2427-the sandy but agreeable young woman did n’t answer [his]65-frederick question , but looked extraordinarily pleased to see [him]65-frederick . Why should [she]2427-the sandy but agreeable young woman be extraordinarily pleased to see [him]65-frederick ? “ What a delightful place this is , ”[65-frederick] said [Frederick]65-frederick , confused , and making the first remark that occurred to [him]65-frederick . “ It ’s a tub of love , ”[2428-the sandy young woman] said [the sandy young woman]2428-the sandy young woman earnestly ; which confused [him]65-frederick more than ever . And [his]65-frederick confusion became excessive at the next words [he]65-frederick heard — spoken , these , by [the old lady]1532-the old lady , who said : “ [We]3022-we wo n’t wait . [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline is always late”—for[1532-the old lady] [he]65-frederick only then , on hearing [her]1532-the old lady name , really and properly remembered [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline , and the thought of [her]1532-the old lady confused [him]65-frederick to excess . [He]65-frederick went into [the dining - room]843-the dining - room like [a man in a dream]2431-a man in a dream . [He]65-frederick had come out to [this place]2743-this place to see [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline , and had told [her]1532-the old lady so . [He]65-frederick had even told [her]1532-the old lady in [his]65-frederick fatuousness — it was true , but how fatuous — that [he]65-frederick had n’t been able to help coming . [He]65-frederick had used it and written under it so long that [he]65-frederick almost thought it was [himself]65-frederick . In the short time since [she]1532-the old lady had left [him]65-frederick on the seat in [the garden]507-the garden , where [he]65-frederick told [her]1532-the old lady [he]65-frederick had come because [he]65-frederick could n’t help it , [he]65-frederick had found [Rose]73-rose again , had passionately embraced and been embraced , and had forgotten [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline . It would be an extraordinary piece of good fortune if [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline ’s being late meant [she]75-lady caroline was tired or bored and would not come to dinner at all . Then [he]65-frederick could — no , [he]65-frederick could n’t . But even so , what a running away . No , [he]65-frederick could n’t . When [they]2436-they got to [the dining - room]843-the dining - room [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher went to the head of the table — was this [[Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher ’s house]2438-mrs. fisher ’s house ? [he]65-frederick asked [himself]65-frederick . [He]65-frederick did n’t know ; [he]65-frederick did n’t know anything — and [Rose]73-rose , who in [her]73-rose earlier days of defying [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher had taken the other end as [her]73-rose place , for after all [no one]308-no one could say by looking at a table which was its top and which its bottom , led [Frederick]65-frederick to the seat next to [her]73-rose . Beyond that [he]65-frederick knew nothing . The situation was one with which [he]65-frederick felt [he]65-frederick could not cope . It must lead [him]65-frederick whither it would . [They]2447-they were , [he]65-frederick could see , very intelligent and attractive eyes , and full , apart from the inquiry of goodwill . Probably [she]2446-the young woman opposite thought [he]65-frederick ought to talk — but if [she]2446-the young woman opposite knew everything [she]2446-the young woman opposite would n’t think so . The soup was taken away , and the fish was brought . [Briggs]72-briggs , on the other side of the empty chair , seemed more uneasy than ever . What was the matter with [Briggs]72-briggs ? Did n’t [he]72-briggs like fish ? [Frederick]65-frederick wondered what [Briggs]72-briggs would do in the way of fidgets if [he]72-briggs were in [his]72-briggs own situation . [Frederick]65-frederick kept on wiping [his]65-frederick moustache , and was not able to look up from [his]65-frederick plate , but that was as much as [he]65-frederick showed of what [he]65-frederick was feeling . Though [he]65-frederick did n’t look up [he]65-frederick felt the eyes of [the young woman]2456-the young woman opposite raking [him]65-frederick like searchlights , and [Rose]73-rose ’s eyes were on [him]65-frederick too , [he]65-frederick knew , but they rested on [him]65-frederick unquestioningly , beautifully , like a benediction . How long would [they]2457-they go on doing that once [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline was [there]207-there ? [He]65-frederick did n’t know ; [he]65-frederick did n’t know anything . [He]65-frederick wiped [his]65-frederick moustache for the twentieth unnecessary time , and could not quite keep [his]65-frederick hand steady , and [the young woman]2456-the young woman opposite saw [his]65-frederick hand not being quite steady , and [her]2456-the young woman eyes raked [him]65-frederick persistently . Then [Briggs]72-briggs leapt to [his]72-briggs feet . What was the matter with [Briggs]72-briggs ? Oh — yes — quite : [she]2456-the young woman had come . [Frederick]65-frederick wiped [his]65-frederick moustache and got up too . [He]65-frederick was in for it now . Absurd , fantastic situation . Well , whatever happened [he]65-frederick could only drift — drift , and look like an ass to [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline , [the most absolute as well as deceitful ass]2460-the most absolute as well as deceitful ass — an ass who was also a reptile , for [she]75-lady caroline might well think [he]65-frederick had been mocking [her]75-lady caroline out in [the garden]507-the garden when [he]65-frederick said , no doubt in a shaking voice — [fool and ass]2462-fool and ass — that [he]65-frederick had come because [he]65-frederick could n’t help it ; while as for what [he]65-frederick would look like to [[his]65-frederick Rose]2388-his rose — when [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline introduced [him]65-frederick to [her]75-lady caroline — when [Lady Caroline]75-lady caroline introduced [him]65-frederick as [[her]75-lady caroline friend whom [she]75-lady caroline had invited in to dinner]2464-her friend whom she had invited in to dinner — well , [God]63-god alone knew that . [He]65-frederick , therefore , as [he]65-frederick got up wiped [his]65-frederick moustache for the last time before the catastrophe . But [he]65-frederick was reckoning without [Scrap]108-scrap . [That accomplished and experienced young woman]2465-that accomplished and experienced young woman slipped into the chair [Briggs]72-briggs was holding for [her]2465-that accomplished and experienced young woman , and on [Lotty]94-lotty ’s leaning across eagerly , and saying before [any one else]2466-any one else could get a word in , “ Just fancy , [Caroline]75-lady caroline , how quickly [[Rose]73-rose ’s husband]2350-rose ’s husband has got [here]2640-here ! ”[2465-that accomplished and experienced young woman] turned to [him]65-frederick without so much as the faintest shadow of surprise on [her]2465-that accomplished and experienced young woman face , and held out [her]2465-that accomplished and experienced young woman hand , and smiled like [a young angel]2467-a young angel , and said , “ and [me]2467-a young angel late [your]65-frederick very first evening . ”[2467-a young angel] [The daughter of [the Droitwiches]152-the droitwiches]2886-the daughter of the droitwiches . . .

That evening was the evening of the full moon . [The garden]507-the garden was an enchanted place where all the flowers seemed white . The lilies , the daphnes , the orange - blossom , the white stocks , the white pinks , the white roses — [you]2470-you could see these as plainly as in the day - time ; but the coloured flowers existed only as fragrance . [The three younger women]2471-the three younger women sat on the low wall at the end of [the top garden]1084-the top garden after dinner , [Rose]73-rose a little apart from [the others]949-the others , and watched the enormous moon moving slowly over the place where [Shelley]173-shelley had lived [his]65-frederick last months just on a hundred years before . [The sea]265-the sea quivered along the path of the moon . The stars winked and trembled . [The mountains]728-the mountains were misty blue outlines , with little clusters of lights shining through from [little clusters of homes]2476-little clusters of homes . In [the garden]507-the garden the plants stood quite still , straight and unstirred by the smallest ruffle of air . Through the glass doors [the dining - room]843-the dining - room , with [its]843-the dining - room candle - lit table and brilliant flowers — nasturtiums and marigolds that night — glowed like some magic cave of colour , and [the three men smoking round it]2479-the three men smoking round it looked [strangely animated figures seen from the silence , the huge cool calm of outside]2480-strangely animated figures seen from the silence , the huge cool calm of outside . [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher had gone to [the drawing - room]1504-the drawing - room and the fire . [Scrap]108-scrap and [Lotty]94-lotty , [their]2471-the three younger women faces upturned to the sky , said very little and in whispers . [Rose]73-rose said nothing . [Her]73-rose face too was upturned . [She]73-rose was looking at the umbrella pine , which had been smitten into something glorious , silhouetted against stars . Every now and then [Scrap]108-scrap ’s eyes lingered on [Rose]73-rose ; so did [Lotty]94-lotty ’s . For [Rose]73-rose was lovely . Anywhere at that moment , among [all the well - known beauties]2482-all the well - known beauties , [she]73-rose would have been lovely . [Nobody]225-nobody could have put [her]73-rose in the shade , blown out [her]73-rose light that evening ; [she]73-rose was too evidently shining . [Lotty]94-lotty bent close to [Scrap]108-scrap ’s ear , and whispered . “ Love , ”[94-lotty] [she]94-lotty whispered . [Scrap]108-scrap nodded . “ Yes , ”[94-lotty] [she]94-lotty said , under [her]94-lotty breath . [She]94-lotty was obliged to admit it . [You]2484-you only had to look at [Rose]73-rose to know that here was Love . “ There ’s nothing like it , ”[94-lotty] whispered [Lotty]94-lotty . [Scrap]108-scrap was silent . “ It ’s a great thing , ”[94-lotty] whispered [Lotty]94-lotty after a pause , during which [they]2485-they both watched [Rose]73-rose ’s upturned face , “ to get on with one ’s loving . Perhaps [you]73-rose can tell [me]73-rose of anything else in [the world]398-the world that works such wonders . ”[73-rose] But [Scrap]108-scrap could n’t tell [her]94-lotty ; and if [she]108-scrap could have , what a night to begin arguing in . This was a night for — [She]108-scrap pulled [herself]108-scrap up . Love again . It was everywhere . There was no getting away from it . [She]108-scrap had come to [this place]2743-this place to get away from [it]2743-this place , and here was [everybody]2599-everybody in [its]2743-this place different stages . Even [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher seemed to have been brushed by one of the many feathers of [Love]174-rose ’s wing , and at dinner was different — full of concern because [Mr. Briggs]72-briggs would n’t eat , and [her]108-scrap face when [she]108-scrap turned to [him]72-briggs all soft with motherliness . [Scrap]108-scrap looked up at the pine - tree motionless among stars . Beauty made [you]2488-you love , and love made [you]2488-you beautiful . . . [She]108-scrap pulled [her]108-scrap wrap closer round [her]108-scrap with a gesture of defence , of keeping out and off . [She]108-scrap did n’t want to grow sentimental . Difficult not to , here ; the marvellous night stole in through all one ’s chinks , and brought in with it , whether [one]229-one wanted them or not , enormous feelings — feelings [one]229-one could n’t manage , great things about death and time and waste ; glorious and devastating things , magnificent and bleak , at once rapture and terror and immense , heart - cleaving longing . [She]108-scrap felt small and dreadfully alone . [She]108-scrap felt uncovered and defenceless . Instinctively [she]108-scrap pulled [her]108-scrap wrap closer . With this thing of chiffon [she]108-scrap tried to protect [herself]108-scrap from the eternities . “ [I]94-lotty suppose , ”[94-lotty] whispered [Lotty]94-lotty , “ [[Rose]174-rose ’s husband]2350-rose ’s husband seems to [you]108-scrap just [an ordinary , good - natured , middle - aged man]3034-an ordinary , good - natured , middle - aged man . ”[94-lotty] [Scrap]108-scrap brought [her]108-scrap gaze down from the stars and looked at [Lotty]94-lotty a moment while [she]108-scrap focussed [her]108-scrap mind again . “ Just [a rather red , rather round man]3035-a rather red , rather round man , ”[94-lotty] whispered [Lotty]94-lotty . [Scrap]108-scrap bowed [her]108-scrap head . “ [He]2350-rose ’s husband is n’t , ”[94-lotty] whispered [Lotty]94-lotty . “ [Rose]174-rose sees through all that . That ’s mere trimmings . [She]174-rose sees what [we]3036-we ca n’t see , because [she]174-rose loves [him]2350-rose ’s husband . ”[94-lotty] Always love . [Scrap]108-scrap got up , and winding [herself]108-scrap very tightly in [her]108-scrap wrap moved away to [her]108-scrap day corner , and sat down there alone on the wall and looked out across [the other sea]2491-the other sea , [the sea where the sun had gone down]2492-the sea where the sun had gone down , [the sea]265-the sea with the far - away dim shadow stretching into it which was [France]35-france . Yes , love worked wonders , and [Mr. Arundel]172-mr. arundel — [she]108-scrap could n’t at once get used to [his]172-mr. arundel other name — was to [Rose Love]174-rose itself ; but it also worked inverted wonders , it did n’t invariably , as [she]108-scrap well knew , transfigure [people]274-people into [saints and angels]2495-saints and angels . Grievously indeed did it sometimes do the opposite . [She]108-scrap had had it in [her]108-scrap life applied to [her]108-scrap to excess . If it had let [her]108-scrap alone , if it had at least been moderate and infrequent , [she]108-scrap might , [she]108-scrap thought , have turned out [a quite decent , generous - minded , kindly , human being]2496-a quite decent , generous - minded , kindly , human being . And what was [she]108-scrap , thanks to this love [Lotty]94-lotty talked so much about ? [Scrap]108-scrap searched for a just description . [She]108-scrap was [a spoilt , a sour , a suspicious , and a selfish spinster]2497-a spoilt , a sour , a suspicious , and a selfish spinster . The glass doors of [the dining - room]843-the dining - room opened , and [the three men]2499-the three men came out into [the garden]507-the garden , [Mr. Wilkins]54-mr. wilkins ’s voice flowing along in front of [them]2499-the three men . [He]54-mr. wilkins appeared to be doing all the talking ; [the other two]1450-the other two were saying nothing . Perhaps [she]108-scrap had better go back to [Lotty]94-lotty and [Rose]174-rose ; it would be tiresome to be discovered and hemmed into [thatcul - de - sacby]2502-thatcul - de - sacby [Mr. Briggs]72-briggs . [She]108-scrap got up reluctantly , for [she]108-scrap considered it unpardonable of [Mr. Briggs]72-briggs to force [her]108-scrap to move about like this , to force [her]108-scrap out of any place [she]108-scrap wished to sit in ; and [she]108-scrap emerged from the daphne bushes feeling like [some gaunt , stern figure of just resentment]2503-some gaunt , stern figure of just resentment and wishing that [she]108-scrap looked as gaunt and stern as [she]108-scrap felt ; so would [she]108-scrap have struck repugnance into the soul of [Mr. Briggs]72-briggs , and been free of [him]72-briggs . But [she]108-scrap knew [she]108-scrap did n’t look like that , however hard [she]108-scrap might try . At dinner [his]72-briggs hand shook when [he]72-briggs drank , and [he]72-briggs could n’t speak to [her]108-scrap without flushing scarlet and then going pale , and [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher ’s eyes had sought [hers]108-scrap with the entreaty of one who asks that [[her]76-mrs. fisher only son]2504-her only son may not be hurt . How could [a human being]2505-a human being , thought [Scrap]108-scrap , frowning as [she]108-scrap issued forth from [her]108-scrap corner , how could [a man made in [God]63-god ’s image]2506-a man made in god ’s image behave so ; and [he]72-briggs fitted for better things [she]108-scrap was sure , with [his]72-briggs youth , [his]72-briggs attractiveness , and [his]72-briggs brains . [He]72-briggs had brains . [She]108-scrap had examined [him]72-briggs cautiously whenever at dinner [Mrs. Fisher]76-mrs. fisher forced [him]72-briggs to turn away to answer [her]108-scrap , and [she]108-scrap was sure [he]72-briggs had brains . Also [he]72-briggs had character ; there was something noble about [his]72-briggs head , about the shape of [his]72-briggs forehead — noble and kind . All the more deplorable that [he]72-briggs should allow [himself]72-briggs to be infatuated by [a mere outside]2507-a mere outside , and waste any of [his]72-briggs strength , any of [his]72-briggs peace of mind , hanging round just [a woman - thing]2508-a woman - thing . If only [he]72-briggs could see right through [her]108-scrap , see through all [her]108-scrap skin and stuff , [he]72-briggs would be cured , and [she]108-scrap might go on sitting undisturbed on this wonderful night by [herself]108-scrap . Just beyond the daphne bushes [she]108-scrap met [Frederick]65-frederick , hurrying . “ [I]65-frederick was determined to find [you]108-scrap first , ”[65-frederick] [he]65-frederick said , “ before [I]65-frederick go to [Rose]174-rose . ”[65-frederick] And [he]65-frederick added quickly , “ [I]65-frederick want to kiss [your]108-scrap shoes . ”[65-frederick] “ Do [you]65-frederick ? ”[108-scrap] said [Scrap]108-scrap , smiling . “ Then [I]108-scrap must go and put on [my]108-scrap new ones . These are n’t nearly good enough . ”[108-scrap] [She]108-scrap felt immensely well - disposed towards [Frederick]65-frederick . [He]65-frederick , at least , would grab no more . [His]65-frederick grabbing days , so sudden and so brief , were done . [Nice man]2509-nice man ; [agreeable man]2510-agreeable man . [She]108-scrap now definitely liked [him]65-frederick . That last week the syringa came out at [San Salvatore]14-san salvatore , and all the acacias flowered . [No one]308-no one had noticed how many acacias there were till one day [the garden]507-the garden was full of a new scent , and there were the delicate trees , the lovely successors to the wistaria , hung all over among [their]2578-their trembling leaves with blossom . To lie under an acacia tree that last week and look up through the branches at its frail leaves and white flowers quivering against the blue of the sky , while the least movement of the air shook down their scent , was a great happiness . Indeed , [the whole garden]2579-the whole garden dressed itself gradually towards the end in white , and grew more and more scented . There were the lilies , as vigorous as ever , and the white stocks and white pinks and white banksia roses , and the syringa and the jessamine , and at last the crowning fragrance of the acacias . When , on the first of May , [everybody]2599-everybody went away , even after [they]2599-everybody had got to [the bottom of [the hill]1623-the hill]2581-the bottom of the hill and passed through the iron gates out into [the village]604-the village [they]2599-everybody still could smell the acacias .
